name: piecs
description: PIECS is an entity component system with some batteries included, some not
author: Sondre <sondre.skaardal.jensen@gmail.com>

scripts.bench: yarn build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node performance/bench.mjs >> result.log
scripts.profile: yarn build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node --cpu-prof --trace-deopt performance/bench.mjs >> result.log
scripts.release: yarn publish && gh release create $(git describe --tags) dist/*.* package.json README.md
